visualization.name: Surface Plot
visualization.help:
### What is the Surface Plot Viewer?
This visualization allows you to create interactive 3D surface plots from your tabular or CSV data using the [Plotly](https://plotly.com/) library.
After selecting a dataset, a three-dimensional surface will be rendered based on your data, providing a detailed view of gradients, peaks, and valleys.
#### Key Features
- **3D Surface Rendering**: Visualize two-variable functions or surfaces with height and color. - **Interactive Controls**: Rotate, zoom, and pan the 3D plot freely. - **Color Mapping**: Colors reflect the surface height values for enhanced interpretation. - **Perspective Exploration**: Explore complex relationships and patterns in three dimensions.
This tool is ideal for visualizing geographical data, scientific surfaces, or any 3D matrix-like dataset.
To learn more about Plotly, visit: [https://plotly.com/](https://plotly.com/)
